meanings.definition: The act of deceiving or misleading someone.
meanings.sent1: Her deceptions were quickly uncovered by her friends.
meanings.sent2: The magician's deceptions amazed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful deceptions made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The web of deceptions in the mystery novel kept readers guessing.
meanings.sent5: The deceptions in the spy movie were so cleverly done.

meanings.definition: False appearance or behavior intended to deceive others.
meanings.sent1: The deceptions of the con artist fooled many people.
meanings.sent2: His deceptions were finally revealed during the investigation.
meanings.sent3: The deceptions of the fake painting were discovered by experts.
meanings.sent4: The deceptions of the mirage vanished as they got closer.
meanings.sent5: The deceptions of the mask hid his true identity.
